description: One pan, three steps and 30 minutes are all youâ€™ll need to make this fragrant chicken recipe with turmeric and ginger.
keywords: Casserole,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Weeknight dinner,Aug 2020,Sesame free,Quick & easy dinner,Soy free,Wheat free,Tomato,Chicken,Spinach,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: One-Pan Turmeric & Ginger Chicken Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 fresh long red chilli, deseeded (thinly sliced)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Add chicken and cook, turning, for 3 minutes or until golden. Remove from pan.

Add onion to pan and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until softened. Add turmeric, paprika, ginger and garlic. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add pumpkin, chicken, coconut milk and 1 cup water. Bring to the boil.

Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 15 minutes, adding tomato in the last 5 minutes of cooking time, or until pumpkin is tender and chicken is cooked through. Serve topped with spinach and chilli.
